transArray.content: Checking in on the fourth day of the Lunar New Year, I asked in advance if there were any epidemic restrictions. Basically everything went smoothly. There was a problem when checking the itinerary, and they were quickly helped to solve it. The front desk also upgraded the room for free and provided breakfast, which can be said to be very warm. This is my second stay and I will go there again in the future. not bad.

Dear guest, we are very happy to receive your praise of our service. Thank you very much for your affirmation and support. We will continue to work hard to provide a clean and comfortable accommodation environment and high-quality and considerate service. The failure to get your full approval for every guest proves that we still have room for improvement. In the days to come, Orange Beijing Wukesongâ€™s friends will be more attentive and serve every guest well. Thank you for your support along the way. , looking forward to your every visit! I wish you a new year and a happy start to your work!
